alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 4:31PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Oglala Lakota County through 500 PM MDT... At 431 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Dry Wood Housing, or 26 miles northwest of Pine Ridge, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dry Wood Housing around 440 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Oglala, Loneman and South Lakeside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
